alert.note: Alert for Catahoula; Franklin (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 13 at 5:31PM CDT until May 13 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Catahoula Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Southwestern Franklin Parish in northeastern Louisiana... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 530 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Jigger, or near Winnsboro, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Jigger around 540 PM CDT. Wisner around 600 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Sicily Island. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
